title: ScamViruS
author: ScamViruS
content: What happened: Fake Crypto Staking platform.  Website : Code:https://bakerylswap.uno/staking-hook/If you are a member of any popular crypto project's Telegram group, you may receive messages with this tempting offer. I've already received this offer, and I understand what it's intended at first glance. The huge ROI they are offering is unrealistic because no real platform would dare to offer such a huge ROI. So now don't connect your wallet to such website hoping to cover losses quickly in this bear market.Because this is a trap for you, if you connect your wallet to this website, your entire fund will be hacked by scammers. So be safe, and avoid clicking on any link shared by someone you don't know.QuoteDomain Name: BAKERYLSWAP.UNORegistry Domain ID: D340299174-CNICRegistrar WHOIS Server: whois.namesilo.comRegistrar URL: https://www.namesilo.comUpdated Date: 2022-12-26T02:47:00.0ZCreation Date: 2022-12-26T02:40:36.0ZRegistry Expiry Date: 2023-12-26T23:59:59.0ZRegistrar: NameSilo, LLCRegistrar IANA ID: 1479

comments.author: Xxmodded
comments.body: Real scammer and website different from original and trusted site is  [bakeryswap], with real website clearly without use domain dot uno and adopted with dot org. I think every one can seeing which one real or trusted dapp exchange website and scam. I think many possibility how scammer make another side duplicate with real, not only with  [bakeryswap] but also have many site until myetherwallet ever duplicate with fake or scam website. You have explain clearly and be careful for every one without have any history browsing with bakeryswap and directly opening with fake or scam website.

comments.author: ScamViruS
comments.body: Quote from: Xxmodded on December 29, 2022, 08:45:06 AMReal scammer and website different from original and trusted site is  [bakeryswap], with real website clearly without use domain dot uno and adopted with dot org. I think every one can seeing which one real or trusted dapp exchange website and scam. I think many possibility how scammer make another side duplicate with real, not only with  [bakeryswap] but also have many site until myetherwallet ever duplicate with fake or scam website. You have explain clearly and be careful for every one without have any history browsing with bakeryswap and directly opening with fake or scam website.These fake websites are appearing more and more these days. This is because scammers use bear market depression to easily scam crypto investors. Now scammers don't create scam websites using different giveaway techniques like before. Now they create fake websites with attractive offers using the names of various popular projects, so that they can get access to the wallets of crypto users.

comments.author: coupable
comments.body: Quote from: Xxmodded on December 29, 2022, 08:45:06 AMReal scammer and website different from original and trusted site is  [bakeryswap], with real website clearly without use domain dot uno and adopted with dot org. I think every one can seeing which one real or trusted dapp exchange website and scam. I think many possibility how scammer make another side duplicate with real, not only with  [bakeryswap] but also have many site until myetherwallet ever duplicate with fake or scam website.Unfortunately, and no matter how intuitive it may seem to you that the difference between the two links is clear and that one of them is a fake copy of the second, those scammers actually succeed in attracting victims through those offers that are too good to be true. As it is known, a small percentage of users search before using links from unreliable sources.Some of the scammers not only make fake copies of well-known sites, but also succeed in promoting them in search engines so that they appear at the top of any search results.Personally, I still think that this forum is the best place to verify links to active platforms or to ask about the credibility of some service offers, especially investment ones.

comments.author: Getmon
comments.body: Quote from: coupable on December 29, 2022, 05:38:22 PMQuote from: Xxmodded on December 29, 2022, 08:45:06 AMReal scammer and website different from original and trusted site is  [bakeryswap], with real website clearly without use domain dot uno and adopted with dot org. I think every one can seeing which one real or trusted dapp exchange website and scam. I think many possibility how scammer make another side duplicate with real, not only with  [bakeryswap] but also have many site until myetherwallet ever duplicate with fake or scam website.Unfortunately, and no matter how intuitive it may seem to you that the difference between the two links is clear and that one of them is a fake copy of the second, those scammers actually succeed in attracting victims through those offers that are too good to be true. As it is known, a small percentage of users search before using links from unreliable sources.Some of the scammers not only make fake copies of well-known sites, but also succeed in promoting them in search engines so that they appear at the top of any search results.Personally, I still think that this forum is the best place to verify links to active platforms or to ask about the credibility of some service offers, especially investment ones.Before, a scammer tried to trick me into believing that crypto staking and investing can yield too-good-to-be-true returns, which is the same reason crypto is becoming popular. That dummy has no idea that I've been involved in cryptocurrency for a long time.There was a period of time when I search here first when I am looking for a site that I am not exceptionally acquainted with. Phishing became popular at that time, and it was surprising that fake websites also appeared at the top of search engines. Maybe it was coinmarketcap when a scam link was posted for a specific coin or was it an exchange.

As it is known, a small percentage of users search before using links from unreliable sources.Some of the scammers not only make fake copies of well-known sites, but also succeed in promoting them in search engines so that they appear at the top of any search results.Personally, I still think that this forum is the best place to verify links to active platforms or to ask about the credibility of some service offers, especially investment ones.Before, a scammer tried to trick me into believing that crypto staking and investing can yield too-good-to-be-true returns, which is the same reason crypto is becoming popular. That dummy has no idea that I've been involved in cryptocurrency for a long time.There was a period of time when I search here first when I am looking for a site that I am not exceptionally acquainted with. Phishing became popular at that time, and it was surprising that fake websites also appeared at the top of search engines. Maybe it was coinmarketcap when a scam link was posted for a specific coin or was it an exchange. They continue to do this things because they always know that there will be a newbie that will fall in their traps. This is why newbie guys should always realize the great rule on investing that if its good to be true its not true this is discuss by many channels or people so hopefully they always value what those people experience because scam will not happen if they will not let those scammers fool them and feed them wrong information which can catch their interest.Its really better to research and have experience on everything since it can take away the possibilities that we will be scam by those scams.

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: Quote from: Xxmodded on December 29, 2022, 08:45:06 AMReal scammer and website different from original and trusted site is  [bakeryswap], with real website clearly without use domain dot uno and adopted with dot org. I think every one can seeing which one real or trusted dapp exchange website and scam. I think many possibility how scammer make another side duplicate with real, not only with  [bakeryswap] but also have many site until myetherwallet ever duplicate with fake or scam website. I used to trade on Bakeryswap, so this one is a total clone of Bakeryswap if you are not into small details you will fall to this, so it's better to bookmark all the sites where you connect your wallet, and be very detail-oriented on sites that you're visiting,These scammers are targetting people who do not bookmark and check the URL of the sites that they are interacting with.People should understand that if you are lax in your security you will be in trouble, you only need one mistake to fall into these scammers' trap.

comments.author: ScamViruS
comments.body: Quote from: aioc on December 30, 2022, 02:56:54 PMI used to trade on Bakeryswap, so this one is a total clone of Bakeryswap if you are not into small details you will fall to this, so it's better to bookmark all the sites where you connect your wallet, and be very detail-oriented on sites that you're visiting,These scammers are targetting people who do not bookmark and check the URL of the sites that they are interacting with.People should understand that if you are lax in your security you will be in trouble, you only need one mistake to fall into these scammers' trap.Nowadays, scammers are creating a lot of clone websites to steal the wallet information of crypto users. As a result, even experienced crypto users are often confused, so it is important to remember to avoid connecting wallets to websites other than bookmarked websites. Because once a crypto user falls into the trap of a clone website, that crypto user will lose everything. So being careful is important to stay safe.
